snippet: Our first Hangout in our London 2012 series took place earlier today with Carmelo Anthony of the Knicks and Chris Paul of the Los Angeles Clippers, who spoke with Jason Stallman, deputy sports editor of The Times.
abstract: Our first Hangout in our London 2012 series took place earlier today with Carmelo Anthony of the Knicks and Chris Paul of the Los Angeles Clippers, who spoke with Jason Stallman, deputy sports editor of The Times.

headline.main: Video: Google+ Hangout With Carmelo Anthony and Chris Paul
